recipe.title: Roasted Fennel and Red Onions
ingredients: 2 large fennel bulbs (sometimes called anise; about 2 pounds), stalks ;trimmed flush with bulb and any tough outer layers discarded
instructions: Cut each fennel bulb lengthwise into 8 wedges and in a roasting pan toss fennel and onions with butter, oil, and salt and pepper to taste. Roast vegetables, stirring once halfway through roasting, 25 minutes, or until tender. Add vinegar to vegetables and toss to coat.
